title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister agriculture food marine) (no 2) order 2023

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Ciaran O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Ciaran O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 
with effect from 23 October 2023. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

20 December, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [699] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
